reviewtext: I know not all brands of CD-Rs work in all burners, in DVDs, or in all car players, and I know buying a spindle of 50 is a gamble, but the odds are definitely in your favor if you buy these.  The only coasters I've made have been my own fault, and they work in my home CD player, my DVD, and both cars.  Read the other reviews here and you will see that the bad reviews are few and far between, again putting the odds well in your favor.  And at less than 50 cents each...
